name: com.rutherfordum.unity-editor-tools
description:
UnityEditorTools is a set of tools that can automate routine tasks to speed up development. At the moment it contains two tools for generating classes with Addressables and AnimatorController data.

AnimatorToolEditor is a tool for creating a class with AnimatorController properties. It simplifies life when you have a lot of properties in the animator and reduces the time for creating a class manually.

AddressablesToolEditor is a tool for creating a class with AddressablesGroup properties (keys). It simplifies life when you have a lot of objects in the AddressablesGroup and reduces the time for creating a class with keys for loading them.
